DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine prevalence dental caries preterm birth child age 2-5 year primary dentition .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Dental Caries Preterm Birth Children Aged 2-5 Years Primary Dentition
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine prevalence dental caries preterm birth child age 2-5 year primary dentition . PICO format : - Population ( P ) = preterm child age 2-5 year attend Cairo University Children 's Hospital `` Abo El-Rish '' El-Monira , Cairo , Egypt . Outcome ( O ) =prevalence dental caries
DOC.criteria: Children age 25 year old . Presence primary teeth . Children born preterm gestational age 6,7 8 month . Children disability mental disorder . Children immune compromising condition . Hospitalized chronically ill child .
